title: Were homeowners encouraged to burn batteries to prevent the ecstasy?
subtitle: :: Readers ' advice on burning batteries in the heater to prevent the formation of soot and the production of colored flames.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: A picture of DIY magazine tipped from 1950s shows readers' instructions to burn zinc batteries in the stove in order to prevent the formation of soot and the production of colored flames is real.
